channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Universities hold graduation ceremonies as students protest across the US
item.description: Some colleges have canceled or modified graduation ceremonies as more than 2,000 people have been arrested on campuses since April 18, as pro-Palestinian protests ripples across the US. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Houston area faces 'life-threatening' flood conditions as severe weather hits Texas
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott has issued a disaster declaration for dozens of counties in Texas as severe weather and flooding threaten the state.

item.title: May 3, 2024 - US college protests
item.description: More than 2,100 people have been arrested on college and university campuses since April 18, as a wave of pro-Palestinian protests ripples across the US.

item.title: Lewiston bowling alley reopens 6 months after Maine's deadliest mass shooting
item.description: It’s a dilemma no business owner should have to face: whether to reopen after a mass shooting

item.title: Former Trump aide Hope Hicks testifies in hush money trial
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's hush money trial continues in New York.

item.title: Columbia student protest organizer describes a police raid on campus
item.description: Columbia students were suspended after their arrests at the “Gaza Solidarity Encampment,” a tactic colleges across the country have also employed.

item.title: US job market shows signs of cooling, with just 175,000 jobs added in April
item.description: The latest snapshot on US employment was a shocker: The economy added 175,000 jobs, far below expectations for 235,000 and a reversal of the trend for robust monthly gains.

item.title: WATCH: Tornado spotted in central Texas
item.description: Dramatic video shows a large tornado touching down near homes in central Texas. Gov. Greg Abbott issued a disaster declaration for dozens of counties as the state was pummeled by severe storms.

item.title: May 2, 2024 - US college protests
item.description: Police are cracking down on protests against Israel's bombardment of Gaza at campuses across the US.

item.title: Police carry out complex choreography in campus protests response
item.description: Dynamic scenes of massive encampments, vocal demonstrations and building occupation have now been playing out on private and public college properties.
